content: **enjoy the easy to knit maribel topper pattern as a forever free download do me a favor and add the pattern to your faves and share photos of your finished pieces ** > if you want to knit yours from a convenient knit kit like i did here you can > choose from 24 color combinations right now at > ** yarnz2go 1 ** it s the perfect little doodah to cover your shoulders anytime of year knitted from the top down with a slightly rolled neckline from where it grows over your shoulders giving you ample space to move around in as you can see in the photos the lower part gets an another single color added to mush the colors around a bit it s fun it s an easy knit too just knits yarn overs and knitting two stitches together the finished topper measures 11 in height and 97 in the bottom circumference the pattern is fully written and offers a how to video link as well **yarn** a skein of lustrous a self striping sport weight yarn 380 yards/100 grams a skein in a 70% cotton/30% viscose a skein of linen 197 yards in a fingering weight yarn in a 50/50 linen/viscose knit kits at ** yarnz2go 2 ** **notions needed ** two us size 3 3 25 mm circular needles one 16 42 cm and one 36 91 cm in lengths us size 8 5 mm circular needle 36 91 cm in length a stitch marker to mar the beginning of rounds tapestry needle or crochet hook for finishing **gauge ** 19 sts and 26 row in 4 of stockinette stitch with us 3 needle and c1 yarn **techniques applied ** knitting in the round yarn overs knitting two stitches together adding another yarn to knit with two strands changing needle size to make it grow more stretchy bind off weaving in ends and blocking for best results **enjoy your knit ** 1 https //yarnz2go myshopify com/products/maribel-topper 2 https //yarnz2go myshopify com/products/maribel-topper
